summary: This document is an email chain from October 2019 between the FBI Victim Services Division and a legal representative regarding a victim's attendance at an FBI briefing on the Epstein case in New York. It details logistical arrangements for the victim's travel from Louisiana and coordination for a separate meeting with agents.

persons.name: Amanda N. Young
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of the initial email from the FBI Victim Services Division, indicating she is an FBI agent in New York involved in coordinating the victim briefing.

events.title: FBI Epstein Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: An FBI briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled to be held in a federal building in New York.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was organizing a briefing for Epstein victims in New York on October 23, 2019.
A victim located in Louisiana expressed willingness to attend, requiring FBI assistance with travel and lodging due to the distance.
The victim's legal representative indicated the victim was also willing to meet separately with FBI agents about her experience while in New York.
The briefing was to be held in a federal building, necessitating the collection of personal information for security clearance.
